answers.answer: Also do you have high cortisol (produced by the adrenals)? This would make you nervous and anxious. As mentioned by undervenued, above, it could be a sugar problem. But I am thinking more of hypoglycemia (low blood sugar). Hypoglycemics eat many small meals a day, instead of three large ones. But, of itself, that doesn't cause them to be overweightl

question: Im hungry every hour and tend to get anxious nervous
title: can constant hunger be caused from psychological
